fw.name: KinematicsInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATIKinCmd
class.abstract: Interface to get kinematics command's information.

method.name: GetJoint
method.abstract: Returns the kinematics joint associated to the command.

method.name: GetParameter
method.abstract: Returns the parameter of the command.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the command.

class.name: CATIKinJoint
class.abstract: Interface to get and set kinematics joint's information.

method.name: GetCmdTypes
method.abstract: Returns the available command types for the joint.

method.name: GetConnectors
method.abstract: Returns the connectors of the joint.

method.name: GetConstraints
method.abstract: Returns the constraints of the joint.

method.name: GetFrame
method.abstract: Returns a frame from the joint definition.

method.name: GetJointValues
method.abstract: Returns the parameter values of the joint.

method.name: GetLowerLimit1
method.abstract: Gets the lower limit existence and value for the first parameter of the joint.

method.name: GetLowerLimit2
method.abstract: Gets the lower limit existence and value for the second parameter of the joint.

method.name: GetProductList
method.abstract: Returns the products involved in the joint.

method.name: GetRatio
method.abstract: Returns the ratio of the joint.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the joint.

method.name: GetUpperLimit1
method.abstract: Gets the upper limit existence and value for the first parameter of the joint.

method.name: GetUpperLimit2
method.abstract: Gets the upper limit existence and value for the second parameter of the joint.

method.name: SetLowerLimit1
method.abstract: Sets the lower limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: SetLowerLimit2
method.abstract: Sets the lower limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: SetRatio
method.abstract: Sets the ratio of the joint.

method.name: SetUpperLimit1
method.abstract: Sets the upper limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: SetUpperLimit2
method.abstract: Sets the upper limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: UnsetLowerLimit1
method.abstract: Unsets the lower limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: UnsetLowerLimit2
method.abstract: Unsets the lower limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

method.name: UnsetUpperLimit1
method.abstract: Unsets the upper limit of the joint, for the first parameter.

method.name: UnsetUpperLimit2
method.abstract: Unsets the upper limit of the joint, for the second parameter.

class.name: CATIKinMechanism
class.abstract: Interface to get and set mechanism's information.

method.name: AddCommand
method.abstract: Creates a new command in a mechanism.

method.name: AddJoint
method.abstract: Creates a new joint in a mechanism.

method.name: GetCmdList
method.abstract: Returns the list of commands of the mechanism.

method.name: GetCmdValues
method.abstract: Returns the values of each command of the mechanism.

method.name: GetFixedProduct
method.abstract: Returns the fixed product of the mechanism.

method.name: GetJointList
method.abstract: Returns the list of joints of the mechanism.

method.name: GetProductList
method.abstract: Returns the list of the products involved in the mechanism.

method.name: GetProductMotion
method.abstract: Gets the motion of one product after calling a Set or ResetCmdValues.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Returns the status of a mechanism.

method.name: GetTimeParameter
method.abstract: Returns the time parameter of the mechanism.

method.name: RemoveCommand
method.abstract: Removes a command in the mechanism .

method.name: RemoveJoint
method.abstract: Removes a joint in the mechanism .

method.name: ResetCmdValueToZero
method.abstract: Sets the command value to zero for the given command without disturbing part positions.

method.name: ResetCmdValues
method.abstract: Resets the values of each command of the mechanism to their initial position.

method.name: SetCmdValues
method.abstract: Sets the values of each command of the mechanism and performs a solve with these values.

method.name: SetCmdValuesWithMultiSteps
method.abstract: Reaches the command values in given number of steps and updates the visualization after each step.

method.name: SetFixedProduct
method.abstract: Sets a new fixed product on mechanism.

method.name: SetTimeParameter
method.abstract: Sets the values of the time parameter of the mechanism and performs a solve with these value (only if mechanism can be simulated with laws).

method.name: UpdateAllJoints
method.abstract: Update all the mechanism joints.

method.name: CreateInstance
method.abstract: Create a mechanism.

method.name: ListInstances
method.abstract: List all mechanisms in a document.
